values.desc1: We are driven by the desire to make a difference. We are a society, not a business. We focus 100% on creating the best environment for our Mates.
values.desc2: We don’t stop at the surface. We dive deep into code and technology, but we always remember the human behind the screen through physical activity and community.
values.desc3: All our blog posts and updates are available as audio, so you can listen on the go – whether you prefer text or speech.
values.desc4: We build more than just code. We create a unique community where being a 'nerd' is a superpower. Through events, Padel, and projects, you meet like-minded people.
